title: Lentil and butternut squash pate
ingredients: ['1 onion', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 dash olive oil', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground coriander', '1 teaspoon garam masala', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '900ml (1 1/2pt) vegetable stock', '1 chopped butternut squash', '175g red lentils', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon milk']
